mapper.sql: id, user_id, associate_user_id, state, create_time, modify_time

insert into t_association
id,
user_id,
associate_user_id,
state,
create_time,
modify_time,

update t_association
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
associate_user_id = #{associateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_association set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, associate_user_id = #{associateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_association where user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc

select
from t_association where associate_user_id = #{associateUserId} order by create_time desc
